author: Press
title: Free three-month subscription offer on Vocalcoms Cloud Contact Centre solution at GITEX Technology Week 2015
text:
(MENAFN Press) Vocalcom, a leading contact centre and cloud solutions provider, has announced that it will be offering free three-month subscriptions for its Cloud Contact Centre solution during their participation at this year's edition of GITEX Technology Week, the largest information and communications technology (ICT) event in the Middle East, Africa and South Asia, which will be held from October 18 to 22, 2015 at the Dubai World Trade Centre (DWTC). Under the terms of the promotion, the company is offering an initial three-month free subscription upon subscribing to its Cloud Contact Centre solution package. Vocalcom will also throw the spotlight on its diverse portfolio of contact automation solutions and services during the exciting week-long show. The company's stand will be located at Stand No. Z-C30 at the Zabeel Hall of the DWTC. 

Vocalcom's Cloud Contact Centre solution is an all-in-one software product that is highly secure, scalable and easy-to-use. This engaging new solution gives users the ability to efficiently manage all calls in one place--phone, web, email, text message or social media. This gives sales representatives the added advantage of being able to increase sales and provide fast customer support and assistance. Other features for the Cloud Contact Centre software include skills-based routing, prioritized calls and automatic screen pop. Lastly, the solution offers a Virtual Hold feature, which reduces hold time and smoothens call spikes. 

"The UAE's business landscape is continuously evolving and along with this change comes an increased demand for key software solutions that can help improve their operations and place them ahead of the competition. During this year's edition of GITEX, we will be leveraging our wide portfolio of products and solutions that can help drive in more productivity and enhanced efficiencies for local businesses. Our Cloud Contact Centre solution, in particular, has been developed to increase the potential of contact centres with its pure flexibility, unparalleled performance and responsiveness. To help attract more subscribers, we are offering a free three-month subscription for interested businesses--allowing them the opportunity to experience the many advantages and benefits to be gained from using our products," concluded Ali Kassab, Executive Vice President for Corporate Growth-Middle East, Africa and APAC, Vocalcom. 



About Vocalcom 
Vocalcom is a global provider of contact centre software and sales acceleration technology. Established in 1995, the company has now evolved to a strong presence across 47 countries--providing its more than 3,700 clients with a whole new way to connect to their customers using the latest innovations in mobile, social, and cloud technology to sell, service and collect.
